name: Into the Woods (TheMinefreak, KerelOlivier)
description:
That forest is awfully dark, but your ball isn't going to roll out on its own. You better go get it.

[A,D] to move
[Space] to jump
[Shift + A/D] to push/pull rocks
[E] to open doors (requires 3 fireflies)

3rd party credits:

"Awkward Meeting" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
